title: Having issues Patching 7.14? Click Here!
body:
Hey all,

7.14 is on the horizon! Coming with it will be our newest addition to the roster, Kayn! However… we can’t help but feel like we’re forgetting someone else as this horrifying by lonely feeling washes over us…

http://i.imgur.com/KoCuD2Y.png

… Did you guys hear something? Anyway, let’s focus on making sure your patch goes smoothly and we focus on whats really important, the soul of Kayn, Check out the steps below for a solution to your issue. If you don’t see one that helps, no worries, just post your problem below and we’ll help you down there!

------------------------------------------------

>#Why does the End of Game Stats screen take FOREVER to freakin' load?!

This might be due to the "Close Client During Game" option in the client.  This option makes the client close out when you enter a game, which means after the game it has to completely reboot to start.  Low Spec Mode should be enough to keep things running smoothly, so disable this option by entering the client, clicking the gear in the upper right hand corner, [and unchecking the box.](http://i.imgur.com/smwR8be.png)

>#I've  tried the Updated Client before, and it was sooooo laggy

We've made some massive changes to the Updated Client make it run as smoothly as possible, even on the proudest of potatoes.  Enable Low Spec Mode if it isn’t on already.  You can find out by clicking the gear in the upper right hand corner of the Updated Client and then [click "Enable Low Spec Mode"](http://i.imgur.com/rPGRnYW.png)

>#Patching Failed and we're not sure why Error: 004

This error usually occurs when Operating System Permissions isn't set properly.  Essentially, the patcher is trying to access files found on your hard drive, but it is being denied from doing so.  [Follow the steps in this guide to get this resolved!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

>#Something's up with our servers and it's preventing you from patching Error: 003

Occurs when the patcher isn't able to maintain a stable connection with our Patcher Servers.  If the patcher loses connection to the server to get the necessary files, it will simply stop working.  To get this resolved, [make sure to complete all of the solutions in this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

--------------------------------------

If you have a problem that isn’t here or those solutions aren’t working, drop a comment below and we’ll be sure to respond and help you out!  ^.^

replies.body: Same problem with a lot of people here, unable to connect to the login queue. Even tried uninstalling the game and reinstall but it still doesn't work. Was playing fine last night. I'm playing on a Mac and have been trying to log in for the past 3 hours
yup same as me except im on pc. played fine last night but as soon as i woke up this morning and tried to log in i got this issue.
I am "unable to connect to the login queue" after I updated to patch 7.14. I have already tried the steps listed in the guide, but it still doesn't work (also tried hextech repair tool).

I am "unable to connect to the login queue" after I updated to patch 7.14. I have already tried the steps listed in the guide, but it still doesn't work. Also iv been put in low priority queue now too. Not sure what that was about. thats 4 or 5 games strait im going to wait for a fix. So now i have an update, ok.

It sounds like you must have been able to finally login if you were able to see that LPQ. If you're still having troubles logging in after going through those troubleshooting guides, reach out to our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
aww plz come back

Ahhhhh okay I see what's going wrong now. Your client is able to connect to the matchmaking servers just fine but it's having some difficulty getting connected to the servers where the games are actually played. Since you've got that ticket submitted, our tech guys will be able to look over your system and some of your logs to see what's going wrong.
I am having the same issue. Is there any fix yet ?
ok thanks bro
do you know how often they look at tickets?

i can log in but i cant play https://youtu.be/un368gPNJ9s?t=447
i have put in a ticket just takes a long time

Last night around 8 pm ET, I was kicked off the client and told my patching failed. I tried to reinstall and it cuts out at 80%, giving the same message. I recently switched my permissions around and it has given me the same problem. It also has been very slow to download, and my internet connection is decent at most times. Any tips would be appreciated!

Your own internet connection is probably rather solid, but your network is having some difficulty getting a good link with our servers. Double check you [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for anything that could use some updates and let me know if that's able to help.
You were completely right, the network had to be reconfigured and now it works. 5 stars for you, sir!
Unable to connect to login queue. I was able to earlier today and now when I try I am constantly not able to login in. Fix please, I see a lot of other people not able to connect

Hi ! My client has correctly patch the 7.14 versions. ( I'm on NA Server, living in The Phillippines ). When I try to login, i received a error message "unable to acces to the login queue". Can you tell me exactly what's going on ? I tried Hextech Repair Tool already and it's told me that everything's was fine. 

Thanks in advance

Every game my loading screen looks like so, and takes over 3-4 minutes to load into a game.
Seemingly its the same for everyone I talk to
http://i.imgur.com/8DRkjry.png
happens to me to ....i got leavebuster twice already since the patch update...on the patch before took me few seconds to connect no it take like 4 mins. and its not  the  internet for god sake

Is there any reason to why every time I play Trundle my fps goes to nothing? Ive lost two ranked game because of this. The first time i thought it was just lag and i repaired my league and all that stuff but it still doesnt work

hi guys after finshing a game trying to reconnect error apear but the network is good after i restart my client it doesnt login the client stuck in authenticating
plz help me and thank you for helping me

A change in your network or security settings could be blocking you from reaching the authentication servers.  Start out with the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to clear those blocks and get back in.  Let me know if that helps.
The fucking loading screen keeps getting frozen every now and then and I am getting punished for it

I don't recommend playing anymore matchmade games until this gets fixed up.  It sounds like your connection is failing to get to the game server, so you'll get stuck at loading and time out.  You'll want to go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Just be sure to test it in a custom first!
i'm unable to use chat on anything

Your network might be blocking you from accessing pvp.net.  If this is still an issue, the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help get that restored for you.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Im downloading the game and as soon as it reached about 30-40% it crashes.

Crashing this far into it can indicate a connection issue cutting off from the patching server.   Go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot this towards a resolution.  That should get you squared away!
game freezes on champ select, when will you guys fix this?  it has been going on since new client

Depending on your PC, you may need to enable [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode to reduce stress during champion select.  Otherwise, your network might be unstable and leaving you behind.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help fix this up!

Basically I was in a game and our nexus had the animation of being destroyed so i alt f4'd to get out quicker. I was promped with the reconnect button but normally it just disappears and the end game screen shows up. This time it doesn't and when i'm pressing it it has the error of "you have disconnected please check your internet connection etc" I tried to close the client or restart my computer but that reconnect button won't just disappear.
Yeah i was fine yesterday then i logged in and it crashed  now i cant connect to the login queue

i keep having random disconnects in game where everything freezes then unfreezes a few seconds later. its not a ping problem because other tabs open are still loading. this wasnt happening before patch 7.14.

This may actually be a case of some packet loss if your own internet is still functioning pretty well. Check out our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) with the latest network logs that had a disconnect and post a screenshot of the results here using something like Gyazo.
I play kayn, i like this caracter. But hear, you delit this caracter. It's true or not?
We aren't deleting any champions, but [**Urgot **](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/champion-urgot-the-dreadnought) is going to be getting his ability rework soon!

hello , I bought fizz but didn't find him in my own champions and didn't find him in select champions and I found him in purchase history  they take my IP and didn't get anything i tried to refund but didn't work !!!

Sometimes you might need to refresh your client to see those changes. I double checked your inventory and see that Fizz was added shortly after you bought him. Let me know if you still don't see him in your collection page though!
Ty I got him. something else I heard about new missions i didn't get it 2 . i forgot to write about it .thx again

The 2 new missions currently going on are only active for those who own Kayn. No worries though! He should be hitting the free champ rotation soonish, and the missions should be available for everyone at that point!
ok,ty
The client doesn't seem to connect with the internet, both home screen and chat box says that there's no internet connection, even though my internet works fine

Your own internet is probably working normally but it can still have problems getting a solid signal to our servers specifically. Let's try updating some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Pay close attention to the steps on flushing your DNS, but make sure to go through all the steps as well.
i have the same problem i m unable to connect to login queue i tried to reinstall game and it get stucked at patching 35% :/ pls helpp anyone pls

Getting stuck at this point can indicate a connection problem losing comms with the patching server.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help fix that up!  That should get you up to date and back in game.

The server is really laggy after patch 7.14. I can feel my character is having 20fps even if on the top right corner said I have 120 fps or above 60 fps. My ping is 37ms. 
I dont know even its just my character is having 20 fps or the whole game is just too laggy. 
Hope someone can give me an answer

Feeling like your FPS is lower than what's being displayed might actually be a sign of some packet loss. Grab some of the network logs from a game that felt awkward and have our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) analyze it. That should give me a pretty good idea of what we're dealing with if you can post a screenshot of it here!
In the login screen, Text appears first. Diana damage too big for the late game. (0.05s to 1 shot an adc with 1950hp)

No, i'm sorry, problem remain the same, whenever i applied your instructions here....

Riot, come on please, fix this !
